metadata.title: CVE-2016-10739 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) through 2.28, the getaddrinfofunction would successfully parse a string that contained an IPv4 addressfollowed by whitespace and arbitrary characters, which could leadapplications to incorrectly assume that it had parsed a valid string,without the possibility of embedded HTTP headers or other potentiallydangerous substrings.

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
